page.description: The .Clear() method removes all image name entries from the string dictionary.
page.example: dim ir as P dim nm as P ir = ImageResource.get() nm = ir.GetBitmapNameMap() nm.Initialize(<<%str% image_1=$a5_folder image_2=$a5_folder_open %str%) ? nm.exists("image_2") = .T. nm.clear() ? nm.exists("image_2") = .F.
